title.narrative: Feasibility Study for regional program to build foundational accountancy skills

description.narrative:
A project exploring the feasibility of a regional program to build foundational accountancy skills in developing countries under the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC) Professional Accountancy Organization (PAO) Capacity Building Program.
Launched under the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC) Professional Accounting Organization (PAO) Capacity Building Program funded by DFID.

To conduct a feasibility study for a program building basic accountancy skills that enhance public financial management and increase accountancy services for small and micro entities, while providing a pathway to intermediate and advanced accountancy skills and mobility to other countries in the region.
